data.title: China Bank Savings
data.text: For your banking concerns, please call us at (632) 8988-9555 Monday to Friday: 8:30 AM â€“ 5:30 PM, Manila time; Or BSP Financial Consumer Protection Department at (02) 8708-7087. For ATM card related concerns, you may call our 24/7 ATM Center at (02) 8884-7878 or 8884-7622. Outside Metro Manila, contact China Bank Savings using the domestic, toll-free China Bank 1-800 numbers. Dial 1-800-1888-5888 via PLDT 1-800-3888-5888 via Digitel Press 1 for bank services Press 7 to know more about our products and services Press 2 for China Bank Savings We want to hear from you Click here to start CBS Survey
